Beth

-----Original Message-----
From: Schuyler <s.waynforth@...>

Date: Sat, 24 Jan 2009 18:45:06
To: <unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com>
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Halo?


Dang it, Linnaea has an account as well, Vampire616 (and with Simon's I'm not so sure if it Berserk 566 or Berserk566)

Schuyler




________________________________
From: "Kidgie@..." <Kidgie@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, 24 January, 2009 6:15:42 PM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Halo?


Please excuse this is you get this more than once - I am sending this to the
few unschooling lists I am on - thank you VERY much!

Hello, all! I'm a very inactive member here, so sorry about that, but I have
a question. Wondering if any of you, or if any of your children play Halo 3
online, with Xbox Live? My son, age 6, is a heavy player and loves it, and
does this online, but I was hoping he may be able to locate other unschoolers -
it will ease my mind a bit too, I have to admit. My son, Julian, uses his
Dad's name as we can't get him his own card - his user name is Killncrap (lol -
based off of his old highshchool user name for things - Hacncrap - yes, he's
VERY good with computers, lol!). Anyway - if anyone plays, or anyone's
children plays, would you be so kind as to email me off list, if you are interested
in having the kids/you be "buddies" with my son?

Thank you!

Karen
Mama to 5, unschooling Julian, 6 and Julia, 3

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Halo?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Karen, You might find more gamers on this list: unschooling_gamers@yahoogroups.com My son plays a lot of Halo3 on Xbox live and he s found some of his best
messages.messageBody:
Hi Karen,

You might find more gamers on this list:
unschooling_gamers@yahoogroups.com

My son plays a lot of Halo3 on Xbox live and he's found some of his
best on-line friends from the unschooling_gamers email list.

heather
tucson
